headline: 4 Stocks to Watch From the Prospering Electric Power Industry
summary: NEE, SO, VST and EXC have well-chalked-out capital investment plans to upgrade infrastructure and provide efficient service to its customers. The decline in interest rates will reduce the capital servicing costs of these capital-intensive stocks and boost their margins.

raw.headline: 4 Stocks to Watch From the Prospering Electric Power Industry

headline: 5 Momentum Stocks to Buy for December After an Impressive November
